full_summary:
======================

### PR7575 23240-230988 Breakthrough Analyzer

### Solicitation Details

*   *Reference Number:* WS4073460330-Doc4149720149
*   *Solicitation Number:* WS4073460330
*   *Publication Date:* August 16, 2023
*   *Tender Closing Date:* September 8, 2023 at 02:00 PM EST
*   *Contracting Entity:* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   *End-User Entity:* Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

### Project Description

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires a single Breakthrough Analyzer (BTA) for their operations. The delivery location is Ottawa, ON, and the equipment must be handed over no later than November 30, 2023.

### Mandatory Requirements

Please review the Statement of Requirement for more details regarding the specific requirements and specifications for this project.

### Contact Information

*   *Name:* Andreas Psarras2
*   *Email:* [andreas.psarras2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andreas.psarras2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
